bug.author: userkkw
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
from pl_bolts.models.self_supervised import SwAV is not working for me. BYOL and SimCLR all had no problem to import. <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Steps to reproduce the behavior: I installed the package: %pip install -q pytorch-lightning %pip install -q pytorch-lightning-bolts then import the package import torch import pytorch_lightning as pl from pl_bolts.models.self_supervised import SwAV then I got error: ImportError: cannot import name 'SwAV' <denchmark-h:h4>Code sample</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
Google Colab - free tier AWS Sagemaker - kernel: pytorch-latest-p36 with 8 gpus.. <denchmark-h:h3>Additional context</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: Hi! thanks for your contribution!, great first issue!
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/userkkw>@userkkw</denchmark-link> Thank you for reporting the issue. Would you mind upgrading Bolts and retrying?
